@imbeingerica Dubrovnik is a bit nicer than Split I'd say...but staying in Split is worth it for a visit here! One of the highlights of my Croatia trip! ðŸ˜ https://t.co/8g7yEhTlPo
@imbeingerica It only goes once a day so we couldn't get off at any of them. If I was going again then I would plan to get off at a few of them and stay.
@imbeingerica for a few days, there's a lot more to do/see in Dubrovnik. We got the ferry from Split to Dubrovnik which stops at lots of islands...
@imbeingerica I wouldn't recommend our apartment in Dubrovnik...it was very central so quite busy and noisy. I would say Split is only worth staying...
@imbeingerica Stayed here in Split which was lovely! https://t.co/T9mV5tJOh9
